Jon Bon Jovi has worked on behalf of the [[Special Olympics]], the [[American Red Cross]], the [[Elizabeth Glaser]] Pediatric [[AIDS]] Foundation and other groups. Mostly due to the fact that he has been recently diagnosed with HIV. It is one of the main reasons he continues his fight against the disease in hopes that others will live.
